metadata.title: CVE-2023-1859 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in xen_9pfs_front_removet innet/9p/trans_xen.c in Xen transport for 9pfs in the Linux Kernel. This flawcould allow a local attacker to crash the system due to a race problem,possibly leading to a kernel information leak.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
